vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in W_WALLET.Collect (patch_0.sol#28-39):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_0.sol#32-38)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- Acc (patch_0.sol#33)
	- Acc (patch_0.sol#34)
